sections.heading: Sheriff; general powers and duties
sections.text: The sheriff shall exercise the powers and perform the duties conferred and imposed upon him or her by other statutes and by the common law.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 892, p. 548;R.S.1913, § 8566;C.S.1922, § 9517;C.S.1929, § 20-2218;R.S.1943, (1989), § 25-2217;Laws 1990
